title: Bug 4971 Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui plugin, the behavior is strange. It should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'. To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
OB: The copy package operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui behaves strangely.
EB: The copy package operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui should behave correctly.
SR:
1. Create a new project named 'xxx2'.
2. In the package viewer, select a package in project 'A'.
3. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
